          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Digestive enzymes in the ileum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdauungsfördernde Enzyme im Ileum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Enzymes digestives dans l'iléum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Enzymes digestivos no ileum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Enzimi digestivi nell'ileo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χωνευτικά ένζυμα στον ειλεό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enzimas digestivas en el ileum</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the adsorption of digestive enzymes in the ileum onto the epithelial cells of the villi. The enzymes become entangled  within the glycocalyx, the carbohydrate groups of the membrane glycoproteins.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Digestion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">digestive enzyme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">epithelial cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glycocalyx</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glycoprotein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ileum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pancreatic juice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">small intestine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">villi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">villus</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Aufnahme der 
verdauungsfördernden Enzyme im Ileum auf die Epithelzellen der 
Darmzotten. Die Enzyme werden innerhalb des Glycocalyx, die 
Kohlenhydratgruppen der Membrane Glucoproteide verwickelt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'adsorption des 
enzymes digestives dans l'iléum sur les cellules épithéliales des 
villus. Les enzymes deviennent empêtrées dans la glycocalice, 
les groupes d'hydrate de carbone des glycoprotéines de membrane.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o adsorption de enzymes 
digestivos no ileum nas pilhas epithelial dos villi. Os enzymes 
tornam-se entangled dentro do glycocalyx, os grupos do hidrato de 
carbono dos glycoproteins da membrana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'adsorbimento degli 
enzimi digestivi nell'ileo sulle cellule epiteliali dei villi. 
Gli enzimi sono impigliati all'interno del glycocalyx, i gruppi 
del carboidrato delle glicoproteine della membrana.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την προσρόφηση των 
χωνευτικών ενζύμων στον ειλεό επάνω στα epithelial κύτταρα 
villi. Τα ένζυμα γίνονται μπλεγμένα μέσα glycocalyx, 
οι ομάδες υδατανθράκων glycoproteins μεμβρανών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la adsorción de enzimas
digestivas en el ileum sobre las células epiteliales de los villi. 
Las enzimas se enredan dentro del glycocalyx, los grupos del 
carbohidrato de las glicoproteínas de la membrana.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
